data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: An overall graph of a standing wave will look like a sine curve superimposed over a -sine curve. At ____ given ____ in ____, ____, ____ anti-nodes ____ be ____ opposite ____, ____ if ____ is ____, ____ next ____ be ____, ____ up ____ so ____. The nodes will divide the string into equal segments, and so calculations can be done with a sort of arithmetic sequence thing.
data.partBlankContent: An overall graph of a standing wave will look like a sine curve superimposed over a -sine curve. At a__ given po___ in ti__, tho___, conse______ anti-nodes wi__ be o_ opposite si___, s_ if o__ is u_, t__ next wi__ be do__, th__ up a__ so o_. The nodes will divide the string into equal segments, and so calculations can be done with a sort of arithmetic sequence thing.
data.answer: 驻波的整体图看起来就像正弦曲线叠加在负正弦曲线上。然而，在任何给定的时间点，连续的反节点将在相反的两边，所以如果一个_是向上的，下一个将是向下的，然后是向上的，以此类推。节点会把字符串分割成相等的段，所以计算可以用等差数列来完成。
